name: nummerplade
title: Nummerplade
description: Look up info about vehicles in Denmark using either the license plate or VIN.
author: mSarheed

commands.name: search-for-vehicle
commands.title: Search for Vehicle
commands.description: Search for a vehicle using the license plate or VIN

arguments.name: licensePlate
arguments.description: The license plate of the vehicle

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
